Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.crawler
Package info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.crawler

Class CheckingDownloader

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.crawler.CheckingDownloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Downloader
public class CheckingDownloader extends Object implements Downloader
Checks that there are no limit violations during downloads.

Parts of this class are deliberately poorly-written to reduce spoilers.

Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)
